DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study determine performance characteristic ( sensitivity specificity ) Verinata Health Test detect fetal Trisomy 21 ( T21 ) compare karyotype result obtain amniocentesis chorionic villus sampling ( CVS ) . Secondary objective assess performance test detect male gender ( XY ) less common aneuploidy ( Trisomy 13 ( T13 ) , Trisomy 18 ( T18 ) , Turner Syndrome ( 45 , X ) ) compare clinical fetal karyotype .
